scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.test: npm run test-browser && npm run test-node && npm run test-rendering -- --force
scripts.build-examples: shx rm -rf build/examples && webpack --config examples/webpack/config.mjs --mode production
scripts.build-package: npm run build-full && npm run copy-css && npm run generate-types && node tasks/prepare-package.js
scripts.build-index: shx rm -f build/index.js && npm run transpile && node tasks/generate-index.js
scripts.build-full: shx rm -rf build/full && npm run build-index && npx rollup --config config/rollup-full-build.js
scripts.transpile: shx rm -rf build/ol && shx mkdir -p build/ol && shx cp -rf src/ol build && node tasks/serialize-workers.cjs && node tasks/set-version.js
scripts.apidoc-debug: shx rm -rf build/apidoc && node --inspect-brk=9229 ./node_modules/jsdoc/jsdoc.js -R config/jsdoc/api/index.md -c config/jsdoc/api/conf.json -P package.json -d build/apidoc
scripts.apidoc: shx rm -rf build/apidoc && jsdoc -R config/jsdoc/api/index.md -c config/jsdoc/api/conf.json -P package.json -d build/apidoc
